summary: Ned's Declassified School Survival Guide is a children's TV show on Nickelodeon.
full_text: Daniel Curtis Lee  is an American actor, comedian, and rapper. He is best known for playing Simon Nelson-Cook  on the Nickelodeon series Ned's Declassified School Survival Guide. He has also appeared in other television shows, such as First Monday and The Shield, and films such as Friday After Next.
title: Daniel Curtis Lee
